bibl.bibl: Hearne, Samuel. 1795. A journey from Prince of Wales’s Fort, in Hudson’s Bay, to the Northern Ocean … in the years 1769, 1770, 1771, & 1772. London: A. Strahan and T. Cadell.
bibl.idno: NF6 662:01.c.11.4 Modern edition with facsimile of original title page. Also RB, but they give date 1796.
